name: andrewgioia.com
description: Internet homepage for Andrew Gioia, co-founder of TeachBoost.

scripts.dev: sass --no-source-map src/scss/theme.scss dist/site.css && cp src/index.html dist/index.html && cp -R src/img dist && cp -R src/icons dist
scripts.prod: sass --no-source-map src/scss/theme.scss dist/site.css && cp src/index.html dist/index.html && cp -R src/img dist && cp -R src/icons dist

author: Andrew Gioia
